item.title: Applying OWASP Web Security Testing Guide (Vandana V)
MultiJuicer Introduction
item.description: About this talk OWASP Juice Shop is an incredible tool to learn and teach about web application security. The Juice Shop lets people attack a real(ish) web application - which looks like a normal eCommerce Shop - and learn step by step about some of the most impactful vulnerabilities. When you are running a Security Training for developers based on the Juice Shop you have one problem: How can every developer run and access his own Juice Shop Instance to train his skills?

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop introduction
item.description: In this introduction session to OWASP Juice Shop we will take a quick tour through the OWASP flagship project that claims to be “probably the most sophisticated vulnerable web application!” Starting with a “happy path” shopping tour we will then learn what security flaws lurk beneath the shiny web UI surface! You will also learn about the CTF support, hacking instructor scripts, tutorial mode, dos and don’ts and some technical background of the project!
